pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Thursday, July 1, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

11:30 a.m. The Prime Minister and his family will visit local merchants at the Parkdale Market in Ottawa, Ontario.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

The Prime Minister will speak with the Executive Director of the Orange Shirt Society and Founder of Orange Shirt Day, Phyllis Webstad.

Closed to media.

Media appearances

12:13 p.m. A brief interview with the Prime Minister will be broadcast live on Radio‑Canada.

12:18 p.m. A brief interview with the Prime Minister will be broadcast live on CBC.
